sn46.20:1.1: “Mendicants, the seven awakening factors, when developed and cultivated, lead solely to disillusionment, dispassion, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment.
sn46.20:1.3: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.20:1.4: These seven awakening factors, when developed and cultivated, lead solely to disillusionment, dispassion, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment.”
